title: My Family: Dad, Mom, Big Sister, Me, Little Sister

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: I have an older sister and a little sister.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
My older sister is Verxina. My little sister is Vivlos. 
The both of them take after our mother— bright, cheerful… and sociable. That's who they are.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …And compared to them, I'm the exact opposite.

text_block_list.name: Female Relative
text_block_list.text:
My oh my, if it isn't Verxina and Vivlos! 
The both of you are dressed up so gorgeously, absolutely adorable!

text_block_list.name: Young Verxina
text_block_list.text: Fufu, thank you very much! Our mother bought these for us. The two of us will also be dancing later, so please look forward to it♪

text_block_list.name: Young Verxina
text_block_list.text: …Cheval, you should join us. Are you sure you don't want to?

text_block_list.name: Young Cheval
text_block_list.text: …I'm okay. I'm not that good at dancing afterall.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …Both of them shine so bright, and then there's plain ol' me.

text_block_list.name: Young Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Alright! 
Let's go run another one then!

text_block_list.name: Young Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Me too! Wait for me big sis～!

text_block_list.name: Trainer from a Club
text_block_list.text: Haha, they're energetic today aren't they! That child has an ability to make those around her happy… She's a real mood maker.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …They were always in the spotlight, while I lingered on the edge.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
I'm just fundamentally different from them. 
…I'm not charming like them at all. That's how it's always been, and it won't change any time soon——

text_block_list.name: Young Cheval
text_block_list.text: Hah, hah… Phew… Hehe.

text_block_list.name: Young Cheval
text_block_list.text: (Races are fun… I never knew something this fun existed… I want to get super, duper, strong——)

text_block_list.name: Trainer from a Club
text_block_list.text: But, those sisters over there have talent!

text_block_list.name: Trainer from a Club
text_block_list.text:
Verxina has a bright future ahead of her! 
I feel like Vivlos will shine just as bright too!

text_block_list.name: Young Cheval
text_block_list.text:
(…I see… Ah, I get it now… 
I think I have to… quit racing too, huh…)

text_block_list.name: Cheval grand
text_block_list.text:
…… 
At that time, I just so happened to watch the "Arima Kinen."

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: The most popular was a gorgeous triple crown uma musume. My older sister and Vivlos were fans of hers and were clinging onto the TV to cheer for her. But the winner of that race was——

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: A certain uma musume, hiding in the light of that triple crown uma musume.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Surrounded in applause, that girl who let out a roar towards the sky was beautiful. I found myself glued to the TV.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Something flared up within me at the moment, something intense that shook me to my core… I jumped out of the room and ran like there was no tomorrow. And then—

text_block_list.name: Young Cheval
text_block_list.text:
…Ah! 
I want to, I want to become just like her!

text_block_list.name: Young Cheval
text_block_list.text:
No matter how much the odds are stacked against her, she took their cheers by force—— 
To be just like her, to be the "Greatest Uma Musume!"

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (And then, with my heart set on that goal, I enrolled into Tracen. This is where it begins, I was determined.)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
(…However, I quickly met the reality of it all. 
…I couldn't win once. Not in mock races, not in the classroom, nowhere.)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
(Obviously everyone would be strong. 
They all work hard, they all love racing, and more than anything else——)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (They were chasing their dreams. Like they didn't know how to be lost… And out of all of them, that girl especially——)

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Hello! I'm Kitasan Black! My goal is to be a powerful and sparkling uma musume, just like Tokai Teio!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: First of all, I will go undefeated in my Classic year and take the triple crown! Nice to meet you all!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (That girl only knew how to look forward.)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
(…Why couldn't I be like that? 
Why am I always hunched over, lingering on the edge?)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
(…No, that's why I'm like that! 
I can't be thinking things like "why am I"!)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (If only I could say "Me too!", and yet all I do is twiddle my thumbs and hesitate… ah… I'm always like this.)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (Comparing myself to others and then losing confidence. I should just keep walking forward, but I'm incapable of doing even that——)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
…I'm such a scaredy cat… 
How could I ever become the greatest uma musume…
While walking around the school, I came across an idle Cheval Grand. And it seems that she was muttering to herself. Muttering something self-deprecating.
She's a uma musume with talent. The "Greatest Uma Musume" whatever that meant, I have no doubt that she'd be able to accomplish great things…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Um, ah, d-did you… h-hear what I said!?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Huh? 
…Well, it's just…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
…N-nevermind, it was nothing… 
I'm sorry… for saying something weird!
